head.title: Robert Cray Band at Appel Farm

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

hedline.hl1: Robert Cray Band at Appel Farm

abstract.p: Robert Cray Band will perform at 13th annual Appel Farm Arts and Music Festival at fairgrounds in Elmer, NJ (S)

block.p: The Robert Cray Band, the torchbearer for gritty, Southern-style blues, is a headliner for the 13th annual Appel Farm Arts and Music Festival on Saturday at the festival fairgrounds in Elmer. The festival includes regional and national musical artists including the flamenco guitarist Oscar Lopez, the blues guitarist Jeff Lang, the country singer Lucinda Williams and the pop rock singers Jess Klein and Sarah Harmer.
